panels.description: Last processed for a specified time period
panels.title: Slot

panels.description: Last processed for a specified time period
panels.title: Epoch

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(p) as Proposed,
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      count(proposed) as a,
      IF(proposed = 0, count(proposed), 0) as m,
      IF(proposed = 1, count(proposed), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validator_proposes
    WHERE (slot_to_propose <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_propose > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY nos_name, proposed
  )
  GROUP by nos_name
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(p) as Proposed,
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      count(proposed) as a,
      IF(proposed = 0, count(proposed), 0) as m,
      IF(proposed = 1, count(proposed), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validator_proposes
    WHERE (slot_to_propose <= 4707007 AND slot_to_propose > (4707007 - 32 * 1))
    GROUP BY nos_name, proposed
  )
  GROUP by nos_name

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    sum(proposed) as Proposed,
    sum(missed) as Missed
  FROM (
  SELECT
    nos_name,
    SUM(a) as all,
    SUM(p) as proposed,
    SUM(m) as missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      count(proposed) as a,
      IF(proposed = 0, count(proposed), 0) as m,
      IF(proposed = 1, count(proposed), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validator_proposes
    WHERE (slot_to_propose <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_propose > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY nos_name, proposed
  )
  GROUP by nos_name
  )
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    sum(proposed) as Proposed,
    sum(missed) as Missed
  FROM (
  SELECT
    nos_name,
    SUM(a) as all,
    SUM(p) as proposed,
    SUM(m) as missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      count(proposed) as a,
      IF(proposed = 0, count(proposed), 0) as m,
      IF(proposed = 1, count(proposed), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validator_proposes
    WHERE (slot_to_propose <= 4730175 AND slot_to_propose > (4730175 - 32 * 3))
    GROUP BY nos_name, proposed
  )
  GROUP by nos_name
  )

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    sum(all) as User,
    (32 * ${epochs} - User) as Other
  FROM (
  SELECT
    nos_name,
    SUM(a) as all,
    SUM(p) as proposed,
    SUM(m) as missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      count(proposed) as a,
      IF(proposed = 0, count(proposed), 0) as m,
      IF(proposed = 1, count(proposed), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validator_proposes
    WHERE (slot_to_propose <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_propose > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY nos_name, proposed
  )
  GROUP by nos_name
  )
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    sum(all) as User,
    (32 * 3 - User) as Other
  FROM (
  SELECT
    nos_name,
    SUM(a) as all,
    SUM(p) as proposed,
    SUM(m) as missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      count(proposed) as a,
      IF(proposed = 0, count(proposed), 0) as m,
      IF(proposed = 1, count(proposed), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validator_proposes
    WHERE (slot_to_propose <= 4730175 AND slot_to_propose > (4730175 - 32 * 3))
    GROUP BY nos_name, proposed
  )
  GROUP by nos_name
  )

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(g) as Good,
    SUM(b) as Bad,
    AVG(ap) as "Avg participation"
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      IF(epoch_participation_percent >= 0, count(epoch_participation_percent), 0) as a,
      IF(epoch_participation_percent >= (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - ${sync_participation_distance_var}), count(epoch_participation_percent), 0) as g,
      IF(epoch_participation_percent < (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - ${sync_participation_distance_var}), count(epoch_participation_percent), 0) as b,
      IF(epoch_participation_percent >= 0, avg(epoch_participation_percent), 0) as ap
      FROM
        stats.validator_sync
      WHERE (last_slot_of_epoch <= ${slot_number_var} AND last_slot_of_epoch > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY nos_name, epoch_participation_percent, epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg
  )
  GROUP by nos_name
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    nos_name as Operator,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(g) as Good,
    SUM(b) as Bad,
    AVG(ap) as "Avg participation"
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      IF(epoch_participation_percent >= 0, count(epoch_participation_percent), 0) as a,
      IF(epoch_participation_percent >= (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - 10), count(epoch_participation_percent), 0) as g,
      IF(epoch_participation_percent < (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - 10), count(epoch_participation_percent), 0) as b,
      IF(epoch_participation_percent >= 0, avg(epoch_participation_percent), 0) as ap
      FROM
        stats.validator_sync
      WHERE (last_slot_of_epoch <= 4707007 AND last_slot_of_epoch > (4707007 - 32 * 1))
    GROUP BY nos_name, epoch_participation_percent, epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg
  )
  GROUP by nos_name

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    SUM(all) as User,
    (512 - User) as Other
  FROM (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      SUM(a) as all
    FROM
    (
      SELECT
        nos_name,
        count(epoch_participation_percent) as a
        FROM
          stats.validator_sync
        WHERE (last_slot_of_epoch <= ${slot_number_var} AND last_slot_of_epoch > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var}))
      GROUP BY nos_name, epoch_participation_percent, epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg
    )
    GROUP by nos_name
  )
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    SUM(all) as User,
    (512 - User) as Other
  FROM (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      SUM(a) as all
    FROM
    (
      SELECT
        nos_name,
        count(epoch_participation_percent) as a
        FROM
          stats.validator_sync
        WHERE (last_slot_of_epoch <= 4730175 AND last_slot_of_epoch > (4730175 - 32))
      GROUP BY nos_name, epoch_participation_percent, epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg
    )
    GROUP by nos_name
  )

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    nos_name,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(p) as Attested,
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      count(attested) as a,
      IF(attested = 0, count(attested), 0) as m,
      IF(attested = 1, count(attested), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE (slot_to_attestation <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_attestation > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs}))
    GROUP BY nos_name, attested
  )
  GROUP by nos_name
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    nos_name,
    SUM(a) as All,
    SUM(p) as Attested,
    SUM(m) as Missed
  FROM
  (
    SELECT
      nos_name,
      count(attested) as a,
      IF(attested = 0, count(attested), 0) as m,
      IF(attested = 1, count(attested), 0) as p
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE (slot_to_attestation <= 4730175 AND slot_to_attestation > (4730175 - 32 * 3))
    GROUP BY nos_name, attested
  )
  GROUP by nos_name

panels.title: Number of validators with negative delta

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  current.balance - previous.balance AS GWei,
  current.nos_name as Operator,
  current.validator_pubkey as Pubkey
FROM 
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, status, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE 
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name IS NOT NULL AND
      slot = ${slot_number_var}
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name IS NOT NULL AND
      slot = (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * 6)
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.nos_id = current.nos_id AND 
  previous.validator_pubkey = current.validator_pubkey
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  current.balance - previous.balance AS GWei,
  current.nos_name as Operator,
  current.validator_pubkey as Pubkey
FROM 
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, status, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE 
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name IS NOT NULL AND
      slot = 4707519
  ) AS current
LEFT JOIN
  (
    SELECT balance, validator_pubkey, nos_id, nos_name 
    FROM stats.validator_balances 
    WHERE
      status != 'pending_queued' AND 
      nos_name IS NOT NULL AND
      slot = (4707519 - 32 * 6)
  ) AS previous
ON
  previous.nos_id = current.nos_id AND 
  previous.validator_pubkey = current.validator_pubkey
ORDER BY GWei ASC
LIMIT 100

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  slot_to_propose,
  nos_name,
  validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_proposes
WHERE proposed = 0 AND (slot_to_propose <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_propose >= (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs}))
ORDER BY slot_to_propose DESC, validator_pubkey
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  slot_to_propose,
  nos_name,
  validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_proposes
WHERE proposed = 0 AND (slot_to_propose <= 4707039 AND slot_to_propose >= (4707039 - 32 * 1))
ORDER BY slot_to_propose DESC, validator_pubkey

panels.title: Number of validators with missed proposals

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    epoch_participation_percent,
    nos_name,
    validator_pubkey
FROM
    stats.validator_sync
WHERE last_slot_of_epoch = ${slot_number_var} AND epoch_participation_percent < (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - ${sync_participation_distance_var})
ORDER BY epoch_participation_percent
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    epoch_participation_percent,
    nos_name,
    validator_pubkey
FROM
    stats.validator_sync
WHERE last_slot_of_epoch = 4702463 AND epoch_participation_percent < (epoch_chain_participation_percent_avg - 10)
ORDER BY epoch_participation_percent

panels.title: Number of validators with sync participation less average

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
  count() as count_fail,
  nos_name,
  validator_pubkey
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE attested = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_attestation <= ${slot_number_var} AND slot_to_attestation > (${slot_number_var} - ${fetch_interval_var} * ${epochs}))
    ORDER BY slot_to_attestation DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
  count() as count_fail,
  nos_name,
  validator_pubkey
FROM (
    SELECT
      validator_pubkey,
      nos_name
    FROM stats.validator_attestations
    WHERE attested = 0 AND 
    (slot_to_attestation <= 4707039 AND slot_to_attestation > (4707039 - 32 * 1))
    ORDER BY slot_to_attestation DESC, validator_pubkey
)
GROUP BY validator_pubkey, nos_name
ORDER BY count_fail DESC, validator_pubkey
LIMIT 100

panels.title: Number of missed attestations (${epochs} epochs range)
Number of validators with missed attestation

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    nos_name,
    validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_balances
WHERE (status == 'active_slashed' OR status == 'exited_slashed' OR validator_slashed == 1) AND nos_name != '' and slot = ${slot_number_var}
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT
    nos_name,
    validator_pubkey
FROM stats.validator_balances
WHERE (status == 'active_slashed' OR status == 'exited_slashed' OR validator_slashed == 1) AND nos_name != '' and slot = 4701759

list.description: Sync participation distance down from Blockchain average
list.label: Sync participation distance down from chain avg
list.name: sync_participation_distance_var

list.definition: WITH epoch_range AS ( SELECT ((${__to:date:seconds} - ${__from:date:seconds}) / 300)::int as val ) SELECT IF (val = 0, 1, val) from epoch_range
list.label: Epoch range
list.name: epochs
list.query: WITH epoch_range AS ( SELECT ((${__to:date:seconds} - ${__from:date:seconds}) / 300)::int as val ) SELECT IF (val = 0, 1, val) from epoch_range
